SELECT A.*
, (SELECT img_data FROM t_ails_crgw_img WHERE work_date = A.work_date AND work_no = A.work_no) imageData , (SELECT shoot_dttm FROM t_ails_crgw_img_data WHERE work_date = A.work_date AND work_no = A.work_no) shootDttm , (SELECT tolof_nm FROM t_ails_crgw_img_data WHERE work_date = A.work_date AND work_no = A.work_no) tolofNm , (SELECT nmrecg_cd FROM t_ails_crgw_img_data WHERE work_date = A.work_date AND work_no = A.work_no) nmrecgCd
FROM t_ails_label_rslt A
JOIN t_ails_nmrecg_clsf B ON A.work_date = B.work_date AND A.work_no = B.work_no
WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.label_type = 'A'
AND A.label_type IN ('B','C','D')
AND A.label_data_text like '%${searchNum}%'
AND A.label_data_text like '%${searchChar}%'
AND A.label_type IN ('E')
AND A.label_type IN ('F')
AND A.label_data_text like '%${searchLabel}%'
AND A.work_date = #{searchDate}
ORDER BY A.work_date, A.work_no

select WORK_DATE , COUNT(1) CNT from t_ails_crgw_img_data WHERE 1 = 1 AND WORK_DATE >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -${searchDate} DAY ),'%Y-%m-%d') AND WORK_DATE <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY WORK_DATE order by WORK_DATE
